description:
The students return from their summer vacations and excitedly share their experiences with each other. Tsuchida-sensei asks his students to draw a picture of their summer vacations. While most students draw their exciting travels and trips to the beach, Aoi draws a picture of her fishmonger parents working.
Tsuchida-sensei comes across a girl with a broken clog thong and helps her home, only to discover she is the daughter of the "Macho Clan." The next day, Hinagiku, the girl Tsuchida-sensei helped, appears at Hanamaru Kindergarten. She has transferred to the kindergarten in order to become Tsuchida-sensei`s wife.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hanamaru Fishmonger, a Hanamaru Rival
Hanamaru na Sakanaya-san / Hanamaru na Rival
はなまるなさかなやさん / はなまるなライバル
